body_html: Actually our math functions in math.h are taking int as index types, so even if we fix the index in FixedDivisor, we cannot really support TIndex as index type in most of the ops. So I think the full support for int64 index can be a later project.
body_text: Actually our math functions in math.h are taking int as index types, so even if we fix the  index in FixedDivisor, we cannot really support TIndex as index type in most of the ops. So I think the full support for int64 index can be a later project.
body: Actually our math functions in math.h are taking int as index types, so even if we fix the  index in FixedDivisor, we cannot really support TIndex as index type in most of the ops. So I think the full support for int64 index can be a later project.
